Articles.Content:
So today I got board and made a new fighter

Yes this is a replica of a Mig 21

Light weight, really fast for it being single engine (140m/s after take off)

Comes with working missiles

only problem I have with it is how bad at turning it is

Sry bad choice of words. It's disabled. I hit it going to slow, but its kinda like a test shot i had to know what the minimum velocity was to injure it. I doubt the armor would have dinged much had i hit that at 120ksp. Nice shot by the way.

Well that drek died. She cant move he engines are killed.

missiles are reverse reloadable, i.e. they can turn around, redock to the front, and you have propultion.

also it's your turn. persist is in my post from earlier.

I don't have heavy enough ships so you're gonna have to wait till I finish the Scythe which will weigh in the area of 100 tons(12-14 hours)

that will be epic! Duel bet. one and a Drek.

Edited November 5, 2013 by zekes

in that case my ship would not be dead either because the missiles are all still attached and i can use them as my propulsion, if that is what you are talking about. I'm at work so i cant till i get back.

in that case my ship would not be dead either because the missiles are all still attached and i can use them as my propulsion, if that is what you are talking about. I'm at work so i cant till i get back.

yeah... i guess. but yours is in much worse shape, with the cockpit dangling out. the only reason i didn't kill it with AFMs is because i was being merciful to your kerb. Not to mention your ship is now just three missiles and a cockpit... you probably have like 100m/s D/V at max.
Unassisted means using dedicated movement engines not weapons,backups hidden somewhere safe are fine.

Unassisted means using dedicated movement engines not weapons,backups hidden somewhere safe are fine.

lol the Dreks have that, but I never tested it and GUESS WHAT? they don't work Looks like a hotfix XIV-IIc will have to be made, with safer engines and backup power.

Ya and putting 2 20 thrust engines on the inside wont help i noticed those when i inspected your craft. I also noticed you have very, very, very, few struts. As if each bit is linked only to one thing? I copied the design last night...

Ya and putting 2 20 thrust engines on the inside wont help i noticed those when i inspected your craft. I also noticed you have very, very, very, few struts. As if each bit is linked only to one thing? I copied the design last night...

yeah, The ships are really floppy ( i can't warp past 2x) but it really absorbs impact, it stops it from transfering through the ship.
Floppy? How so?

Floppy? How so?

try "every single part of the ship is wiggling around".

...but only at high warp and with ASAS on

It has been awhile sense I flew a Excalibur but I knew I needed to update it. Meet the Mk4.

Armed with 7 small SRB missiles

This fighter has now been reborn as an attacker

try "every single part of the ship is wiggling around".

...but only at high warp and with ASAS on

Ah i see. I have not put your ships through the ringer yet seeing as the craft file for the drek before these ones is still not

Ah i see. I have not put your ships through the ringer yet seeing as the craft file for the drek before these ones is still not

It's not too noticible unless the engines are on on the Drek, but in the 15-II it is WAY more obvious, the whole ship flops 10-20 degrees up and down on x4 warp with SAS on.

And i finally go the Emergency engines working... The nev Drekevak XIV-IIc.
Do they give enough detla V?

Do they give enough detla V?

a few hundred on a full tank. mabye 1000, but it really is just for getting close enough to the enemy to loose the smart missiles.

the 2.5km lol

I just got home ill blow up the next drek in a min.

OK a bit more speed did the trick. In your new dreks also I would fix where your mane probe core is cause its right next to the engines. Other than that that is some nice plate.

http://www./download/yv95a2lp7g8gi0a/persistent.sfs

the 2.5km lol

I just got home ill blow up the next drek in a min.

EDIT yeah, but ah well i guess i have to live with it. Taking my turn now.

I made new jettesonable fuel tanks for the Drek and a Drek "Talon" Interplanetary Space Tug.
Looks cool. I like it. Is that for legit missions?

Looks cool. I like it. Is that for legit missions?

recovery of crippled ships, mostly. Or probably setting up orbital fuel depots (which my ships rely on to get anywhere)

...lol stop hitting my Dreks in their knee.

Beowulf Is dead!

Jaguar took two of Riley's missiles and went after Beowulf. One shot, from 1.5 KM away, right up the barrel. Broke her into several useless peices.

Scratch one for Jaguar. Avenge the Riley! Becomes the rallying cry of the 144th battle group.

http://www./?c9nq66egzvkc1ay
Like i said you put your command pod right next to the engines so all i have to do is keep the ball on it. I did manage to get going a bit faster this time 35 extra kms made a big difference.
